2025-09-16.content: Model Armor is integrated with Google Agentspace to provide greater insights and enhanced security of your agent interactions by default. For more information, see [Integration with Google Agentspace](https://cloud.google.com/security-command-center/docs/model-armor-agentspace-integration).

summary.title: Model Armor and Agentspace Integration
summary.summary: Model Armor now integrates with Google Agentspace, offering enhanced security and insights into agent interactions.

2025-09-15.content: [Model Armor integration with Google Kubernetes Engine](https://cloud.google.com/security-command-center/docs/model-armor-gke-integration) is available in [General Availability](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages).

summary.title: Model Armor now on GKE
summary.summary: Model Armor integration with Google Kubernetes Engine is now generally available.

2025-09-08.content: The Model Armor monitoring dashboard provides a centralized view to track interactions and violations within your projects. This feature is available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages). For more information, see [View the monitoring dashboard](https://cloud.google.com/security-command-center/docs/model-armor-monitoring-dashboard).

summary.title: Model Armor Monitoring Dashboard
summary.summary: Introducing the Model Armor monitoring dashboard, a new feature providing a centralized view to track interactions and violations within your projects.

2025-08-04.content: Model Armor supports the `asia-southeast1` location. For information about supported locations, see [Locations for the Model Armor API](https://cloud.google.com/security-command-center/docs/regional-endpoints#locations-model-armor).

2025-07-29.content: You can use Terraform to manage Model Armor floor settings and templates. This helps reduce manual overhead with Model Armor deployments. For more information, see [Terraform resources for Security Command Center](https://cloud.google.com/security-command-center/docs/terraform#resources).

summary.title: Terraform for Model Armor
summary.summary: Manage Model Armor settings with Terraform.
